def calculate_ant_travel_time(n, portals):
    m = 200006
    r = [0] * m
    l = [0] * m
    s = [0] * m
    dp = [0] * m
    sum = [0] * m
    mod = 998244353

    def lower_bound(v):
        left = 1
        right = n
        ans = 0
        while right >= left:
            mid = left + right >> 1
            if r[mid] >= v:
                right = mid - 1
                ans = mid
            else:
                left = mid + 1
        return ans
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        (r[i], l[i], s[i]) = portals[i - 1]
    ans = 0
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        ans = (ans + r[i] - r[i - 1]) % mod
        p = lower_bound(l[i]) - 1
        dp[i] = (r[i] - l[i] + sum[i - 1] - sum[p] + mod * 2) % mod
        sum[i] = (sum[i - 1] + dp[i]) % mod
        if s[i]:
            ans = (ans + dp[i]) % mod
    return (ans + 1) % mod

    r = [0] * m
    l = [0] * m
    s = [1] * m
    dp = [0] * m
    sum = [0] * m
    mod = 998244353

    def lower_bound(v):
        left = 1
        right = n
        ans = 0
        while right >= left:
            mid = left + right >> 1
            if r[mid] >= v:
                right = mid - 1
                ans = mid
            else:
                left = mid + 1
        return ans
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        (r[i], l[i], s[i]) = portals[i - 1]
    ans = 0
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        ans = (ans + r[i] - r[i - 1]) % mod
        p = lower_bound(l[i]) - 1
        dp[i] = (r[i] - l[i] + sum[i - 1] - sum[p] + mod * 2) % mod
        sum[i] = (sum[i - 1] + dp[i]) % mod
        if s[i]:
            ans = (ans + dp[i]) % mod
    return (ans + 1) % mod
